tool_description: Access the official Saudi Arabian (KSA) Government businsess register with this API, ideal for KYB purposes
name: Saudi Arabia Company Data
title: Saudi Arabia Company Data

api_list.name: licenceSearch
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://saudi-arabia-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/sap/opu/odata/sap/ZLIC_VALIDATE_SRV/LicenseDetailsSet('.121029051086-01')"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "saudi-arabia-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://saudi-arabia-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/sap/opu/odata/sap/ZLIC_VALIDATE_SRV/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "saudi-arabia-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
